name: TOW Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why did Chandler say his apartment wasn't there anymore?
options: Because he can't remember where it is
Because Joey got drunk and sold it
questions.explanation:
Because he drank it.

	"All I know is that my apartment isn't there anymore because I drank it." - Chandler

questions.text: What was the sister's second favourite dessert?
questions.explanation:
More Grandma's Tiramisu.

	Chandler - "Mary Angela, what's your favourite dessert?"Grandma -  "Grandma's Tiramisu!"Chandler - "Uh-huh....Mary Angela, what's your second favourite?"Grandma - "More Grandma's Tiramisu!!"

questions.text: Which of Joey's sisters punched Chandler?
questions.explanation:
Cookie.

	Joey told Chandler to apologise to Mary Angela, but Chandler still didn't know which one she was, so Joey told Cookie she could hit Chandler.

questions.text: What did Chandler say to Monica when she told him to stick out his tongue?
questions.explanation:
Take off your shirt.

	Chandler's tongue was blue from drinking all the shots.

questions.text: What did Chandler do before he knocked on the door at Grandma's house?
options: Said "Please, God, don't let her be in"
Turned back, then changed his mind.
questions.explanation:
Knocked his forehead 3 times.

	When Joey answered the door, Chandler panicked.

questions.text: What did Joey say when he found out Chandler had kissed his sis?
questions.correct: "You and my sister, sitting in a tree"
options: "Dude, if you don't marry her, I'll break your face"
"Roses are red, violets are blue, Chandler kissed my sister"
"Here comes the bride, Chandler by her side"
questions.explanation: "You and my sister, sitting in a tree".

questions.text: What was the drink Cookie made right after she shot her husband?
Who did Cookie tell about the drink she made after shooting her husband?
questions.explanation:
Phoebe.

	Phoebe had the same drink, Vodka and Cranberry Juice.

questions.text: And how did Phoebe reply to Cookie's revelation about shooting her husband?
questions.correct: "I don't know how to talk to you."
options: "Okay, stop it, you're freaking me out."
"Oh my God! You shot your husband?"
questions.explanation: "I don't know how to talk to you."
